A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Yeah\, the more I think about it after watching this movie - Star Wars is now going to be video rentals for me going forward.  I've seen reviews that talk about the \"mythology\" being gone from the series now\, yep\, that is accurate.  The end of Rouge One\, with Darth Vader slaughtering Rebels in that hall\, is the basic equivalent of what happened here - Disney = Darth Vader\, Star Wars Universe = Rebels.
